javax.accessibility.Accessible, FilePanel, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class FilePanelImp
extends java.awt.Panel
implements FilePanel

Default (and currently unique) implementation of the FilePanel interface.
